verse.name: v2
verse.lines: O Christmas tree O Christmas tree, newline You stand in verdant beauty. newline O Christmas tree O Christmas tree, newline You stand in verdant beauty. newline Your boughs are green in summer's glow, newline And do not fade in winter's snow. newline O Christmas tree O Christmas tree, newline You stand in verdant beauty.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: O Christmas tree, O Christmas tree, newline Thy leaves are so unchanging, newline O Christmas tree, O Christmas tree, newline Thy leaves are so unchanging; newline Not only green when summer's here, newline But also when 'tis cold and drear. newline O Christmas tree, O Christmas tree, newline Thy leaves are so unchanging!

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: O Christmas tree, O Christmas tree, newline Thy candles shine so brightly, newline O Christmas tree, O Christmas tree, newline Thy candles shine so brightly!

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: O Christmas Tree, O Christmas Tree, newline You bear a wondrous message! newline O Christmas Tree, O Christmas Tree, newline You bear a wondrous message! newline You do proclaim the Savior's birth, newline Good will to men and peace on earth. newline O Christmas Tree, O Christmas Tree, newline You bear a wondrous message!

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: O Christmas Tree, O Christmas tree, newline Of all the trees most lovely; newline O Christmas tree, O Christmas tree, newline Of all the trees most lovely; newline Each year you bring to me delight newline Gleaming in the Christmas night. newline O christmas tree, O Christmas tree, newline Of all the trees most lovely.

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: O Christmas tree, O Christmas tree, newline Your leaves will teach me also, newline O Christmas tree, O Christmas tree, newline Your leaves will teach me also newline That hope and love and faithfulness newline Are precious things I can possess. newline O Christmas tree, O Christmas tree, newline Your leaves will teach me also.
